q_en: What raw materials are used by Skilled Sewers?

steps.sql: SELECT m.id, m.name, m.unit, m.type FROM materials m JOIN product_material pm ON m.id = pm.material_id JOIN products p ON pm.product_id = p.id WHERE p.attributes = 'Fabric Pieces';
steps.description: To find out what raw materials are used by 'Fabric Pieces', we need to query the database for the materials associated with the product having the name 'Fabric Pieces'.

response:
Sure! Here is the answer to your question:

| Material ID | Material Name | Unit | Type |
|-------------|---------------|------|------|
| No results found | No results found | No results found | No results found |

Unfortunately, no raw materials were found to be used by 'Fabric Pieces'. If you have any other questions, feel free to ask! ðŸ˜„
